Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments joined) of the upper-section of a light-brown pottery commodity jar with convex sides, the upper part of one handle survives, the exterior is covered with self-slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393458) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393458)
